title: step-down
description: ESP8266 program which NATs eduroam behind an unencrypted network. Based on the RangeExtender-NAPT from the Arduino ESP8266 community.

title: Creddle Icons
description: A simple Chrome extension to automatically add Github, Devpost, and link icons to Creddle.io resumes!

title: Open Mind
description: A Firefox and Chrome extension which encourages users to become more politically open. Developed with Javascript using browser APIs.

title: FFT-H
description: Using a Altera Cyclone IV FPGA to compute the FFT on hardware! Using Verilog for hardware description and cocotb (python) for the testbench.

title: FFT-S
description: Implementations of the Discrete Fourier Transform - using the naive and Cooley-Tukey algorithms written in Rust. Validates FFT-H.

title: tCP-iP
description: My first foray into Unix systems programming! Using C to play around with sockets and send data packets. Built client and server implementations.

title: Commutr
description: Get the latest news, chat with fellow commuters, and receive updates on transit status. Built on a unique online-offline network infrastructure.

title: upFoot
description: A IoT sensor for foot traffic, interfacing with Slack and Airtable. Built with an ESP8266 microcontroller and a StdLib web service backend.

title: ShareTO
description: A modern geolocation-based online marketplace for the sharing economy. Built using Angular, Java and MongoDB. Hosted on Google Cloud Platform.

title: ChessEngine
description: A Universal Chess Interface compatible chess engine, written in Python. Uses Minimax search with Alpha-Beta pruning and piece-square tables.

title: CustomArduino
description: A redesigned Arduino microcontroller board, from the open source spec. My first project with KiCad and soldering SMT components.

title: LM386 Amp
description: Op-amp circuit based on LM386 chip from Texas Instruments. Powerful enough to drive my electric guitar. Circuit design, layout, and soldering.

title: LearnBach
description: Python scripts for training a neural network to compose baroque-style keyboard music. Conversion between MIDI, .txt, and .csv. File retrieval with requests library.

title: DineSafe
description: Android app that uses restaurant inspection data from OpenData to recommend dining options for users. Java backend with IBM Cloudant database.
